item.title: Grifols 家族表示不会再支持私有化交易
item.description: 有迹象表明，布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）可能会取消收购该公司的计划，因此 Grifols 家族不会支持第三方提出的将其同名药品制造商私有化的新竞标。【原文：The Grifols family won’t support a new bid by a third-party to take its namesake drug-maker private amid indications that Brookfield Asset Management may scrap plans to acquire the company.】

item.title: 汇丰银行在欧盟法院就 3200 万欧元欧洲银行间同业拆借利率操纵罚款的冲突中败诉
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司因非法操纵 Euribor 基准而被欧盟处以近 3200 万欧元的反垄断罚款，但在法庭上败诉。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc lost a court challenge to a European Union antitrust fine of nearly €32 million for illegally rigging the Euribor benchmark.】

item.title: 南非部长呼吁阻止价值 7.3 亿美元的沃达康交易
item.description: 南非贸易、工业和竞争部长正在对南非竞争法庭的一项命令提起上诉，该命令阻止了沃达康集团有限公司（Vodacom Group Ltd. ）以 132 亿兰特（约合 7.3 亿美元）收购 Remgro 有限公司光纤业务股份的交易。【原文：South Africa’s minister of trade, industry and competition is appealing an order by the nation’s Competition Tribunal that blocked Vodacom Group Ltd.’s 13.2 billion-rand ($730 million) deal to buy a stake in Remgro Ltd.’s fiber businesses.】

item.title: 稳定币总价值突破地球时代峰值，接近 2000 亿美元
item.description: 2022 年 TerraUSD 崩溃后，稳定币市场的价值收复失地，达到新的高度。【原文：The value of the stablecoin market has risen to new heights after regaining ground lost in the aftermath of TerraUSD’s infamous collapse in 2022.】

item.title: 欧洲股市下跌，关注欧洲央行利率和特朗普的任命
item.description: 由于投资者关注欧洲央行的降息路径以及美国和中东的地缘政治发展，欧洲股市走低。【原文：European equities edged lower as investors monitored European Central Bank’s rate cuts path as well as geopolitical developments in the US and the Middle East.】

item.title: 德国电信加强与诺基亚的开放网络交易
item.description: 德国电信股份公司选择诺基亚公司（Nokia Oyj）在德国北部铺设 3000 多个开放式网络站点，这家芬兰设备供应商周三表示。【原文：Deutsche Telekom AG chose Nokia Oyj to roll out more than 3,000 open network sites in northern Germany, the Finnish equipment provider said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧洲央行施纳贝尔认为进一步降息空间有限
item.description: 欧洲央行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）表示，欧洲央行需要警惕降息幅度过大，因为借贷成本已经接近不再能抑制经济的水平，降息可能会适得其反。【原文：The European Central Bank needs to be wary of cutting interest rates too far as borrowing cost are already near a level that no longer restrains the economy and going lower could backfire, according to Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel.】

item.title: 印度央行抛售美元令印度银行缺乏流动性
item.description: 本周，印度银行两个月来首次出现流动性短缺，原因是当局为支持卢比而抛售美元，导致金融系统现金流失。【原文：Indian banks suffered a deficit of liquidity this week for the first time in two months as dollar sales by the authorities to support the rupee drained cash from the financial system.】

item.title: 据称布鲁克菲尔德计划放弃收购 Grifols
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，布鲁克菲尔德资产管理有限公司（Brookfield Asset Management Ltd.）正准备放弃收购 Grifols SA 公司的计划，原因是双方对这家西班牙制药商的估值存在分歧。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management Ltd. is preparing to walk away from a plan to acquire Grifols SA over disagreements on valuation for the Spanish drug maker, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 大众汽车出售新疆工厂以离开争议地区
item.description: 由于投资者担心中国西部地区可能存在侵犯人权的行为，大众汽车公司将屈服于压力，结束在新疆的业务活动。【原文：Volkswagen AG will end its activities in Xinjiang, bowing to pressure from investors concerned about possible human-rights abuses in the western Chinese region.】

item.title: 干旱导致作物减产，南非计划发放美国玉米进口许可证
item.description: 仲夏干旱导致当地玉米产量下降 22%，南非将为来自美国的转基因白玉米和黄玉米发放进口许可证。【原文：South Africa will issue import permits for genetically engineered white and yellow corn from the US after a mid-summer drought that caused 22% drop in local production.】

item.title: 日本央行和美联储可能采取利率行动，日元本周表现优于十国集团同类货币
item.description: 本周迄今为止，日元的表现优于其他同类货币，因为交易员们预计下个月美国和日本之间的收益率差距将缩小。【原文：The yen is outperforming its peers so far this week as traders position for the yield gap between the US and Japan to narrow next month.】

item.title: 法国 11 月消费者信心指数意外下降
item.description: 法国消费者信心指数在 11 月份意外下降，使经济雪上加霜，因为法国政府正在努力使预算案在不被赶下台的情况下获得议会通过。【原文：French consumer confidence fell unexpectedly in November, adding to economic headwinds as the government struggles to get a budget through parliament without being evicted from power.】

item.title: 旅游前景强劲，易捷航空股息将增加一倍多
item.description: 易捷航空（EasyJet Plc）提议将今年的派息额提高一倍以上，并表示在假日套餐产品需求强劲的帮助下，公司正在向中期目标取得 "强有力的进展"。【原文：EasyJet Plc proposed to more than double its dividend payout for this year and said it’s making “strong progress” toward its medium-term targets, helped by robust demand for its holiday package offerings.】

item.title: 经济学家报》称，法航正在洽谈收购欧洲航空公司 20% 的股份
item.description: 据《经济学家报》（El Economista）报道，在西班牙航空公司 IAG SA 的收购计划因监管部门的反对而泡汤后，法航荷航（Air France-KLM）正在洽谈收购欧洲航空公司（Air Europa）多达 20% 的股份。【原文：Air France-KLM is in talks to buy a stake of as much as 20% in Air Europa after the Spanish carrier’s planned takeover by IAG SA was scuppered by regulatory opposition, the El Economista newspaper reported.】

item.title: 高盛对南非通胀的乐观预期超过了中央银行的观点
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. is making a contrarian case for a steep slowdown in South Africa inflation next year, setting itself apart from other observers and the country’s central bank.】

item.title: 赛诺菲斥资 6 亿美元在新加坡建厂，加强准备工作
item.description: 赛诺菲公司（Sanofi SA）在新加坡新建了一家生产疫苗和其他药品的工厂，这家法国制药集团正努力加强应对紧急情况（包括潜在的大流行病）的准备工作。【原文：Sanofi SA added a new plant in Singapore to make vaccines and other medicines, as the French pharmaceutical group seeks to bolster preparedness for emergencies, including potential pandemics.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑保持稳定，英国股市将平盘交易
挪威海德鲁公司终止绿色氢能和电池项目
item.description: 由于市场形势严峻，挪威海德鲁公司（Norsk Hydro ASA）将停止为其电池和绿色氢气业务提供资金，并逐步停止这些业务。【原文：Norsk Hydro ASA will halt funding for its battery and green hydrogen businesses and phase them out over time due to challenging market conditions.】

item.title: 印尼最大出租车公司打赌比亚迪工厂将降低电动汽车价格
item.description: 印尼最大的出租车运营商希望即将建成的比亚迪工厂能降低电动汽车的价格，以扩大其车队规模。【原文：Indonesia’s largest taxi operator expects an upcoming BYD Co. plant will bring electric vehicle prices down as it seeks to expand its fleet.】

item.title: PAG 为公司最大的印度收购项目申请 3.75 亿美元贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，亚洲最大的另类资产管理公司之一 PAG 已向四家银行申请了 3.75 亿美元的收购贷款，用于收购印度最大的硬塑料包装供应商。【原文：PAG, one of Asia’s biggest alternative asset managers, has lined up a $375 million buyout loan with four banks for its planned acquisition of India’s largest rigid plastic packaging provider, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: IDC 称苹果错失 2024 年智能手机市场大反弹机会
item.description: 一项独立研究显示，全球智能手机销量在连续两年下滑后，于2024年强劲反弹，但苹果公司（Apple Inc.【原文：Global smartphone sales rebounded strongly in 2024 after two successive years of decline, but Apple Inc. barely managed growth, an independent study showed, underscoring the speed with which Android-based rivals are gaining ground in China and emerging markets.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易主管主张与中国 "战略脱钩
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的最高贸易职位人选将中国视为对美国的 "世代挑战"，并主张与中国在战略上脱钩。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump’s pick for the top trade position sees China as a “generational challenge” to the US and has advocated for a strategic decoupling from the country.】

item.title: 越南誓言在新关税时代购买更多美国飞机和液化天然气
item.description: 越南计划从美国购买更多飞机、液化天然气和其他产品，因为政府官员正在为即将上任的特朗普政府的关税新时代做好准备。【原文：Vietnam plans to buy more aircraft, liquefied natural gas and other products from the US as government officials brace for a new era of tariffs from the incoming Trump administration.】

item.title: 高盛认为特朗普对加拿大征收关税将对美国造成 "重大 "打击
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）认为，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普对加拿大征收关税的提议将给美国消费者带来 "重大影响"，该行对这一提议的实施表示怀疑。【原文：US consumers face “significant consequences” from President-elect Donald Trump’s proposed tariffs on Canada, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc., with the bank casting doubt over its implementation.】

item.title: 新加坡金管局警告贸易和地缘政治紧张局势加剧
item.description: 新加坡中央银行警告说，在贸易摩擦和地缘政治争斗加剧的情况下，全球货币政策存在不确定性。【原文：Singapore’s central bank warned of global monetary policy uncertainty in the face of increased trade friction and geopolitical wrangling.】

item.title: 投资者押注降息，土耳其熊市一触即发
item.description: 土耳其股市是下半年全球表现最差的股市之一，但随着资金经理们押注降息即将到来，土耳其股市的命运已经开始转变。【原文：Turkish stocks are among the world’s worst performers in the second half, but their fortunes are already turning as money managers bet interest rates cuts are coming soon.】

item.title: 欧洲将迎来乌克兰战争以来最寒冷的冬天，带来能源风险
item.description: 欧洲将迎来自俄罗斯入侵乌克兰以来最寒冷的冬天，由于欧洲大陆以比往常更快的速度动用天然气储备，从而推高了能源成本。【原文：Europe is set for the coldest winter since Russia’s invasion of Ukraine, pushing up energy costs as the continent dips into its gas reserves at a faster-than-usual rate.】

item.title: 欧洲以自己的新贸易力量等待特朗普关税冲突的到来
item.description: 本周，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）明确表示，他将利用美国的贸易强权作为施加外交政策影响力的手段，欧洲对跨大西洋经济关系未来的最坏设想浮出水面。【原文：Europe’s worst-case scenario for the future of transatlantic economic relations rose to the surface this week when President-elect Donald Trump gave a clear signal that he’ll use American trade might as a means to exert foreign policy leverage.】

item.title: 炼油厂扩建，俄罗斯石油产品出货量增加
item.description: 随着秋季检修的结束，当地炼油厂加大了生产力度，俄罗斯石油产品出口量在 11 月份反弹至八个月以来的最高水平。【原文：Russian oil-product exports rebounded in November to the highest in eight months as local refineries ramp up production with the end of autumn maintenance.】
